title: An Act relating to income tax rates
description: Reduces the top income tax rate from 5.7% to 4.5% over three years.

title: An Act relating to education funding
description: Increases state funding for K-12 education by 3%.

title: An Act relating to property tax relief
description: Provides exemptions for agricultural property from state taxes.

title: An Act relating to workforce development
description: Expands apprenticeship programs in STEM fields.

title: An Act relating to environmental regulations
description: Tightens water quality testing requirements for agricultural runoff.
